title: 'Best Mechanical Pencil'
body: The metal finish of this pencil gives it a cool royal look. It is smooth and comfy to handle. It has strong and lengthy lead which is one of the best qualities of this pencil. It comes with 2 lead options 2B and 2H, now I don't need to worry about the pencil marks. I used to avoid using the eraser in mechanical pencils, but now I don't need to worry about that too since it comes with 8 extras (+1 already attached). It works smoothly, it is budget friendly and awesome mechanism.  Overall this is the best mechanical pencil I have ever used and it is a great investment as well

title: 'The best in the market. Worth every penny.'
body: I have tried my hands on mechanical pencils from different brands. I got these two 0.5mm and 0.7mm mechanical pencils from brustro recently and after using it here's what I think about them from my artist point of view: 1. The build is so good. It comes with a metal body that is not too heavy and the weight distribution feels perfect in hand. 2. It has 2 lead options 2B and 2H, both of those shades comes with 20 leads in two lead containers. 3. These pencils have a eraser attached at the end of the pencil, which is very handy and we get 8 extras. 4. I have used these for some times and they didn't break easily here and there, which is really good. 5. Now coming to the shading part, the leads doesn't scratch the paper, gives a smooth shading and can be blended really smooth. Also erasing them is very easy and didn't leave dark marks on the paper. 6. Getting all these features with such cool look was really rare, that too at such low price. I would say, they are totally worth the money.  However, I would really love if it had options like (hb, 2b) that we could change and after we change the hb and 2b leads and it would be easier to remember which lead is inside.  I will upload a work using these pencils within a week where you will be able to have a much better idea how these pencils work.

title: 'Excellent product from Brustro'
body: The media could not be loaded. I'll start of with the pencil's metal body which was surprisingly well accomodating to any kind of pressure. Providing a very good grip, this pencil is light weight and easy to handle.  The leads are of incredible quality and as mentioned, indeed are break resistant. I drew many rough lines before drawing this one and all the lines came out neatly. No breaks or smudges anywhere.  This is apt for, illustration, minute line art, sketches, mandala and you name it.  I've even tried giving mild shades here which came out just perfectly as I wanted.  All in all this mechanical pencil is a great asset to any artist who loves neat and clean outcomes.

title: 'Amazing build quality
body: '5.0 out of 5 stars''I recently purchased this mechanical pencil and I have to say I am thoroughly impressed. The build quality is exceptional exuding durability and sturdiness in the hand. The grip is remarkably user-friendly providing a comfortable drawing experience. The leads are impressively resilient ensuring a smooth drawing encounter without frequent breaks. Not to mention these leads produce darker strokes compared to a typical 2B pencil making it perfect for both bold lines and shading.  The eraser functions flawlessly and is refillable adding to the convenience. The sleek design adds a touch of style to the pencil making it visually appealing. The balance of the pencil is amazing enhancing the overall experience. The inclusion of extra HB and 2B refills is a thoughtful addition catering to artists seeking professional results.  In conclusion this mechanical pencil is a valuable addition to any art supplies collection. The quality and smooth writing experience offer great value for the price. I highly recommend it to fellow artists and enthusiasts. Bravo to the brand for creating such an exceptional product! üëå'

title: 'Such a nice product with excellent packaging'
body: This product is just amazing. I am a mandala artist and I have been using mechanical pencils since forever. Recently I got my hands on this brustro mechanical pencil with eraser. I found it very convenient and easy to use. I have also used other premium mechanical pencils that are available in the market but this one just blew my mind and the best part is it won't burn a hole in my pocket.  Sleek Design 1) The entire pencil body is made up of metal with brass components, and feels very solid and sturdy in the hand. 2) The ergonomics and the design are exceptional, it has a sleek design with pocket clip and has a comfortable grip for extended use which suits me fine. It also has a built in eraser under the push button cap. The pack also has extra refills in it and they are also providing extra erasers in the pack.  Weight and size 3) The weight balance is perfect for drawing, sketching and writing. 4) It comes with two different tip sizes 0.5mm and 0.7mm with two different shades of leads as well, HB and 2B.  Overall it is a great mechanical pencil for drawing/sketching/drafting etc. I would highly recommend this product to anyone in need of a high quality pencil. If someone is looking for a comfortable, durable and premium quality mechanical pencil then this is for you.
